pull.title: Replace CAffectedKeysVisitor with descriptor based logic
pull.body: It seems we don't need a custom visitor pattern anymore to find what keys are affected by a script. Instead, infer the descriptor, and see which keys it expands to.

events.message: Replace CAffectedKeysVisitor with descriptor based logic

events.body:
>+13 −67

concept ACK, note that this will now include pubkeys you have, not only private keys, which I think is a more sane general anyways.
